name: Witch's Potion: Wolftooth
text: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material. If you control "Baba Yaga, Witch of the Woods", you can also use 1 monster from your Deck as Fusion Material. You can only activate 1 "Witch's Potion: Wolftooth" per turn.
